text: The 2015 Ping An Chinese Football Association Super League (Chinese: 2015中国平安中国足球协会超级联赛)关于正确使用联赛全名称的函 was the 12th Chinese Super League season and was won by Guangzhou Evergrande Taobao. == Clubs == * Beijing Guoan * Changchun Yatai * Chongqing Lifan * Guangzhou Evergrande * Guangzhou R&F; * Guizhou Renhe * Hangzhou Greentown * Henan Jianye * Jiangsu Suning * Liaoning Whowin * Shandong Luneng * Shanghai Greenland * Shanghai Shenxin * Shanghai SIPG * Shijiazhuang Ever Bright * Tianjin Teda == Table == Below shows the results of the tournament.sports.sina.com Pos Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts Qualification or relegation 1 Guangzhou Evergrande 30 19 10 1 71 28 +43 67 2016 AFC Champions League Group stage 2 Shanghai SIPG 30 19 8 3 63 35 +28 65 2016 AFC Champions League Third qualifying round 3 Shandong Luneng 30 18 5 7 66 41 +25 59 2016 AFC Champions League Second qualifying round 4 Beijing Guoan 30 16 8 6 46 26 +20 56 5 Henan Jianye 30 12 10 8 35 30 +5 46 6 Shanghai Greenland 30 12 6 12 42 44 −2 42 7 Shijiazhuang Ever Bright 30 8 15 7 34 31 +3 39 8 Chongqing Lifan 30 9 8 13 37 52 −15 35 9 Jiangsu Suning 30 9 8 13 39 48 −9 35 2016 AFC Champions League Group stage 10 Changchun Yatai 30 8 11 11 39 47 −8 35 11 Hangzhou Greentown 30 8 9 13 27 35 −8 33 12 Liaoning Whowin 30 7 10 13 30 46 −16 31 13 Tianjin Teda 30 7 10 13 39 46 −7 31 14 Guangzhou R&F;
